event.title: 1833 John Scott, the first Earl of Eldon, (later Lord Chancellor Eldon) replaced

data.event: In 1833 John Scott, the first Earl of Eldon, (later Lord Chancellor Eldon) replaced the chapel, at his own expense, with the present church building standing on the site.

event.title: use as the church hall for many years

data.event: The old church remained in use as the church hall for many years, later it became disused and is now a private residence.
The old church remained in use as the church hall for many years, later it became disused and is now a private residence.
